battleTraits.name: The Blood Tithe
battleTraits.effect: You start the battle with 0 **blood tithe points**. Earn 1 **blood tithe point** each time a unit (friendly or enemy) is destroyed.

battleTraits.name: Spelleater Curse

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability

battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **BLOOD TITHE** abilities this turn. Spend 2 **blood tithe points**.

battleTraits.name: Slaughter Triumphant
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **BLOOD TITHE** abilities this turn. Spend 8 **blood tithe points**.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

 * Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units for the rest of the battle.
 * Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE BLOODTHIRSTER** unit that has been destroyed. Set up an identical replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Murderlust
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **BLOOD TITHE** abilities this turn. Spend 1 **blood tithe point** and pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** unit that is not in combat to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target can move 3". It can move into combat.

battleTraits.name: Brass Skull Meteor
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **BLOOD TITHE** abilities this turn. Spend 4 **blood tithe points** and pick an enemy unit that is visible to a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE HERO** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll 8 dice. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

battleTraits.name: Heads Must Roll
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **BLOOD TITHE** abilities this turn. Spend 6 **blood tithe points**.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE** units.

abilities.name: Butchers of Nations

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a friendly BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON unit

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **BLOODBOUND** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within 12" of the unit using this ability to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

prayers.name: Summon Hexgorger Skulls
prayers.declare: If there is not a friendly **Hexgorger Skulls** invocation on the battlefield, pick a friendly **BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of
prayers.effect: Set up a **Hexgorger Skulls** invocation wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A **Hexgorger Skulls** invocation has 2 parts that must be set up within 8" of each other.

warscrolls.name: Blood Warriors
warscrolls.options:
Each model in this unit is armed with a Goreaxe.

 * 1/10 models can replace their Goreaxe with a Goreglaive.
 * The champion cannot replace their weapons.

abilities.name: No Respite
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll 2 dice. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: The Thinning Veil
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, you can return D3 slain models to this unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Great Axe of Khorne** is 3.

abilities.name: Outrageous Carnage
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made by this unit scores a critical hit, inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit within 8" of it after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Shattering Charge

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target is **INFANTRY**, inflict an additional 3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Prey of the Blood God
abilities.effect: Pick an enemy **HERO** to be this unit's quarry (see 'Stalk the Prey'). You can pick a **HERO** in reserve.

abilities.name: First of the Pack
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **Flesh Hounds** unit, add 2 to charge rolls for this unit. In addition, while any triendly **Flesh Hounds** units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can ignore the effect of the 'Beast' ability.

abilities.name: Stalk the Pray
abilities.effect: If this unit's quarry moved this phase, this unit can move up to 8". It cannot move into combat during any part of that move and must end that move closer to its quarry.

abilities.name: Blood Sacrifice

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit within this unit's combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

* Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
* Gain 1 **blood tithe point.**

abilities.name: Scorn of Sorcery
abilities.effect: This unit can use UNBIND abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1).**
